extensionDescription.message:
Create, modify and quickly change tab groups. 
Inspired by the old add-on "Tab Groups" :)

errorAnotherGroupAreLoading.message: Please wait, another group are loading
errorAnotherGroupAreLoading.description: Please wait, another group are loading

moveTabToGroupMessage.message:
Tab "$tabtitle$" was moved to group "$grouptitle$".

Click here to show this tab.

invalidRegExpRuleTitle.message: Rule '$regexp$' is not valid and it will be skipped.

showNotificationAfterMoveTab.message: Show notification when tab is moved to another group
showNotificationAfterMoveTab.description: Show notification when tab is moved to another group

createNewGroupAfterAttachTabToNewWindow.message: Create new group if tab is moved to new window
createNewGroupAfterAttachTabToNewWindow.description: Create new group if tab is moved to new window

enableKeyboardShortcutLoadNextPrevGroup.message: Enable keyboard shortcuts for next and previous group. i.e. Ctrl+Shift+> and Ctrl+Shift+<
enableKeyboardShortcutLoadNextPrevGroup.description: Enable keyboard shortcuts for next and previous group. i.e. Ctrl+Shift+> and Ctrl+Shift+<

enableKeyboardShortcutLoadByIndexGroup.message: Enable keyboard shortcuts for switch to tab. i.e. Ctrl+Shift+[1-9]
enableKeyboardShortcutLoadByIndexGroup.description: Enable keyboard shortcuts for switch to tab. i.e. Ctrl+Shift+[1-9]

importSettingsOldTabGroupsAddon.message: Import settings from old "Tab Groups" add-on
importSettingsOldTabGroupsAddon.description: Import settings from old "Tab Groups" add-on

openGroupAfterChange.message: Open group after changing to it (if the popup isn't closed)
openGroupAfterChange.description: Open group after changing to it (if the popup isn't closed)

showGroupCircleInSearchedTab.message: Show colored group circle in search tab
showGroupCircleInSearchedTab.description: Show colored group circle in search tab

showUrlTooltipOnTabHover.message: Show url tooltip when hovering over tab
showUrlTooltipOnTabHover.description: Show url tooltip when hovering over tab

searchTabNotFoundTitle.message: Search for tabs for "$search$" not found

deleteGroupPopupBody.message: Do you want to delete group "$name$"?

regexpForTabsHelp.message:
Insert regular expressions for web addresses here. Matching tabs will be moved automatically to this group.
Use one line per rule, there can be as many as you want.
Examples:
github\.com/drive4ik/simple-tab-groups - catch all pages in the add-on's repository
bugzilla\.mozilla\.org - catch Firefox bug reports
(facebook|twitter|youtube)\.com - catch all your social pages
